text.emotional: You need a harvester tool to attach to your tractor. You can either overload the harvest directly into a trailer or use vegetable pallets, so you can deliver them to their destination.
text.silence: {.} you need a harvester tool to attach to your tractor {....} you can either {...} overload the harvest directly into a trailer {....} or use vegetable pallets {...} so you can deliver them to their destination {...}
